data.title: Sam Hinkie, Brett Brown, and the new Sixers organization from Josh Harris
data.meta_description: Sixers coach Doug Collins wasn't the Sixers only problem, but he checked himself out after this terrible season.
data.text:
Brett Brown adds Chad Iske to Coaching Staff

Adding to the list of head-noddingly good decisions the Sixers have made since Doug Collins left.

Brett Brown to be next 76ers head coach

The 76ers and Brett Borwn have agreed on a 4 year contract, reports Ian Thomsen of Sports Illustrated.

Brett Brown offered Sixers coaching job

After a long search, the Sixers appear to have settled on the player development oriented Spurs assistant Brett Brown as their new head coach.

2nd Round Coach Interviews Begin This Week

We might have a list of finalists. We might also not have a list of finalists. Sixers coaching search: For the Greater Good.

Charles Barkley on Sixers Non-Coach

Because Charles Barkley remains a relevant and important source of information and opinions. They're losing no matter what.

Sixers Coach: Top Two Include Brown...and Curry?

Marc Stein sent out a series of tweets at some ghastly hour of the night intimating the new Sixers head coach will be one of two people: San Antonio's Brett Brown or our dear hold friend Michael Curry

Sixers Interested in Snyder, Atkinson

It's been 3 months since the Sixers had a head coach. They are thinking about hiring one. These are candidates.

Sixers Coach: Ed Pinckney, Adrian Griffin?

Sam Hinkie won't stop until all the rumors are proved false. He's apparently received permission to reach out to two Bulls assistants.

Sixers "Officially" Dump Aron For O'Neil

Because when things leak from the organization, deny first, then confirm. O'Neil previously held a similar position for the Knicks and New York Rangers.

Celtics Hire Stevens; Sixers Only Coachless Team

There's something about Sam Hinkie having his pick of the entire universe to coach the Sixers. I'm bleeding confidence.

Source: Spurs Coach Brett Brown to the Celtics?

A source tells LB that Spurs coach Brett Brown, previously linked to Sixers, has mutual interest with Boston. That would leave the Sixers as the only team in the league without a head coach.

Sixers, Spurs Deny Brett Brown Coaching Rumor

Hey I think it's just cool that the Sixers and Spurs are agreeing on something. We must be doing something right!

MAYBE: Sixers Hire Spurs Asst Brett Brown

The Sixers finally have a head coach. And he's a Spurs assistant. This is the best night of my life.

Sixers Gonna Sixers, Offseason Rumor Style

You can take the Sixers out of Sixers, but you can't take the SIXERS out of SIXERS. Running the gamut of storylines for the team right now with help from Friday Night Lights.

Coaching Update: Sixers Interested in Spurs' Brown

Brett Brown has been with the Spurs since 2002, working as an assistant coach and in player development.

Knicks Exec Close to Joining Sixers

He resigned from the Knicks spot last year. Please God let it be as a consulting role. We have enough consultants to field a separate basketball team.

Sixers Coaching Search: Just Wait Longer

The Sixers will take their good, sweet time in hiring a coach. Sam Hinkie wants to make sure he has the personnel in order before bringing in the guy to coach 'em. Dig it.
